21#include <string.h> /* for strlen */
22#include "mpc-impl.h"
23
24char *
25mpc_alloc_str (size_t len)
26{
27 void * (*allocfunc) (size_t);
28 mp_get_memory_functions (&allocfunc, NULL, NULL);
29 return (char *) ((*allocfunc) (len));
30}
31
32char *
33mpc_realloc_str (char * str, size_t oldlen, size_t newlen)
34{
35 void * (*reallocfunc) (void *, size_t, size_t);
36 mp_get_memory_functions (NULL, &reallocfunc, NULL);
37 return (char *) ((*reallocfunc) (str, oldlen, newlen));
38}
39
40void
41mpc_free_str (char *str)
42{
43 void (*freefunc) (void *, size_t);
44 mp_get_memory_functions (NULL, NULL, &freefunc);
45 (*freefunc) (str, strlen (str) + 1);
46}
47
